review: The Chromecast works great, does just what it is supposed to do.  I gave it less than a 5 star rating, for the following reasons.  I don't have a smart tv, so that is why i use the chromecast on my tv, for movies, etc. The chromecast will not work with a windows phone, a windows laptop yes, but not a windows phone, so l had to buy an android tablet to  operate chromecast.  It also will not cast the phone screen or any websites to the tv, a laptop, yes, but not a windows phone, or my android tablet.  Other than that it a great gadgit and i use everyday.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It works great and the price was right!
author: Amazon Customer
